commentsList.count.numberOfComments:
**Functional Purpose**: Displays the total number of comments for a solution
**UI Location**: Community Solutions → Solution Detail Page → Comments section heading
**When Users See This**: When viewing a solution detail page with comments
**Technical Context**: Variables `number` and `pluralize` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "{number} {pluralize('comment', number)}"
commentsList.emptyList.noComments:
**Functional Purpose**: Informs the user that there are no comments yet
**UI Location**: Community Solutions → Solution Detail Page → Comments section (when empty)
**When Users See This**: When a solution has no comments
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "No one has commented on this solution."
commentsList.emptyList.beFirst:
**Functional Purpose**: Encourages the user to add the first comment
**UI Location**: Community Solutions → Solution Detail Page → Comments section (when empty)
**When Users See This**: When a solution has no comments
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Be the first to add your comment!"
